rules_text: [i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Search your library for a Creature, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
II – Choose either; Saber, Rin, or Sakura. Draw a card.
III – Do one based on what you chose in chapter II – 
•Saber – Target creature you control gets +5/+5 and trample until the end of turn.
•Rin – Search your library for an Equipment put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
•Sakura – Exile all creatures.
